name: Xtrackers High Yield Corporate Bond ETF
description: The Xtrackers High Yield Corporate Bond ETF (XHYD) is an exchange-traded fund designed to provide investors with exposure to a diversified portfolio of high-yield corporate bonds. Launched by DWS Group, XHYD aims to track the performance of the Solactive USD High Yield Corporate Bond Index. This index includes U.S. dollar-denominated, non-investment grade corporate bonds, offering the potential for higher income compared to traditional investment-grade bonds. The ETF is managed with a systematic approach, focusing on bonds that are typically rated below investment grade, which carry higher risk but also the potential for greater returns. XHYD offers investors an efficient way to gain access to the high-yield bond market without the need for individual bond selection. The fund is particularly appealing to income-focused investors looking to diversify their fixed-income portfolios. With a transparent fee structure and daily liquidity, XHYD provides a cost-effective solution for accessing high-yield credits in one simple investment vehicle. The ETF also allows for exposure to various sectors, including telecommunications, energy, and healthcare, thus enabling a broader investment strategy within the corporate bond space.

products: XHYD - Xtrackers High Yield Corporate Bond ETF

faq.answer: XHYD aims to track the performance of the Solactive USD High Yield Corporate Bond Index, focusing on non-investment grade corporate bonds.

faq.answer: Investing in XHYD allows for diversification, daily liquidity, and exposure to higher income potential from high-yield corporate bonds.
